responses.label: Emulate detail response for Unibis statements

responses.body:
<SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
   <SOAP-ENV:Body>
      <getWebPricingResponse xmlns="urn:mageServices:mageServices">
         <result xsi:nil="true"/>
         <wsOutOk>true</wsOutOk>
         <wsOutJson>[{{setVar 'wsInList' (jsonParse (body 'soapenv:Envelope.soapenv:Body.urn:getWebPricing.urn:wsInList._cdata'))}}{{setVar 'uomOptions' (array 'MTR' 'EA' 'PK' 'RO' 'PAC' 'PKT')}}{{setVar 'qtyOptions' (array 100 50 10 1)}}{{setVar 'fromOptions' (array 'contract' 'orpc' 'poprice')}}{{setVar 'depOptions' (array 0 78)}}{{setVar 'ratioOptions' (array 100 0.1)}}{{#each (getVar 'wsInList')}}{{setVar 'uom' (oneOf (getVar 'uomOptions'))}}{{setVar 'mult_qty' (oneOf (getVar 'qtyOptions'))}}{{setVar 'ratioconv' (oneOf (getVar 'ratioOptions'))}}{{setVar 'dperc' (oneOf (getVar 'depOptions'))}}{{setVar 'uprice' (faker 'finance.amount' min=0.01 max=1000 dec=4)}}{{setVar 'fprice' (toFixed (multiply (getVar 'uprice') (subtract 1 (divide (getVar 'dperc') 100))) 4)}}{{setVar 'tprice' (toFixed (multiply (getVar 'uprice') (getVar 'mult_qty')) 4)}}{{setVar 'alias_uprice' (toFixed (multiply (getVar 'uprice') (getVar 'mult_qty')) 4)}}{{setVar 'alias_fprice' (toFixed (multiply (getVar 'fprice') (getVar 'mult_qty')) 4)}}{{setVar 'aliasm_uprice' (toFixed (multiply (getVar 'uprice') (getVar 'mult_qty')) 4)}}{{setVar 'aliasm_fprice' (toFixed (multiply (getVar 'fprice') (getVar 'mult_qty')) 4)}}{{setVar 'aliasm_tprice' (toFixed (multiply (getVar 'tprice') (getVar 'mult_qty')) 4)}}{
  "sku": "{{this.sku}}",
  "error": null,
  "from": "contract",
  "uom": "{{getVar 'uom'}}",
  "is_poa": false,
  "iqty": {{getVar 'mult_qty'}},
  "uprice": {{ getVar 'uprice' }},
  "dperc": {{ getVar 'dperc' }},
  "fprice": {{ getVar 'fprice' }},
  "saqty": {{getVar 'mult_qty'}},
  "sauom": "{{getVar 'uom'}}",
  "saconv": {{getVar 'mult_qty'}},
  "samult": true,
  "prqty": 0.01,
  "pruom": "{{getVar 'uom'}}",
  "prconv": 100,
  "prmult": false,
  "breaks": [
    {{#each (array 100 200 300)}}
    {
      "qty": {{this}},
      "label": "{{this}}+",
      "bdisc": 1.5,
      "uprice": {{faker 'finance.amount' min=0.01 max=100 precision=2}}
    }{{#unless @last}},{{/unless}}
    {{/each}}
  ],
  "split": null,
  "ordermult": {
    "qty": {{getVar 'mult_qty'}},
    "valid_qty": false,
    "uprice": {{ getVar 'uprice' }},
    "tprice": {{ getVar 'tprice' }},
    "fprice": {{ getVar 'fprice' }}
  },
  "aliases": [
    {{#each (array 3 4 5)}}
    {
      "sku": "{{faker 'string.numeric' length=9 }}",
      "uom": "{{getVar 'uom'}}",
      "conv": {{getVar 'ratioconv'}},
      "mult": false,
      "selected": false,
      "ratio": {{getVar 'ratioconv'}},
      "uprice": {{ getVar 'alias_uprice' }},
      "fprice": {{ getVar 'alias_fprice' }},
      "iuom": {
        "qty": {{getVar 'mult_qty'}},
        "uprice": {{ getVar 'uprice' }},
        "fprice": {{ getVar 'fprice' }}
      },
      "breaks": [],
      "split": null,
      "ordermult": {
        "qty": 1,
        "valid_qty": true,
        "uprice": {{ getVar 'aliasm_uprice' }},
        "tprice": {{ getVar 'aliasm_tprice' }},
        "fprice": {{ getVar 'aliasm_fprice' }}
      }
    }{{#unless @last}},{{/unless}}
    {{/each}}
  ]
}{{#unless @last}},{{/unless}}
{{/each}}
]</wsOutJson>
      </getWebPricingResponse>
   </SOAP-ENV:Body>
</SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
responses.label: Emulate get price service of UNIBIS
